Subtitle.Text: You will be the captain then.

you are on the same team.

one of the five students named "Zhang Wei" in Shaohai Third High School.
I'm the most ordinary one among them.
I'm telling you. You are not fine.
Students like you are the most troublesome.
You are neither up nor down,
Do you think you can slack off as a junior?
It will be too late when you become a senior.
You came in last in the class.

Go and stand at the back.
He always takes our self study class.

to join the school swimming team,

what is "good looks sealed away by glasses."

There was a loose thread on your shirt.

About forming a men's synchronized swimming team.

in this country that is complete.

that there are not enough members.

is also known as water ballet.
during the intervals of swimming competitions.
along with dancing and strength basics.

it has to be eight people in a team.

why can't boys learn synchronized swimming?

of problem solving at the Nobel Prize level.

and sprint to the other side.

Do you want a one on one fight?
